title: Track Every Expense
intro: Build financial awareness by recording every rupee you spend to identify spending habits and improve money management.

theory.Why Tracking Expenses Matters: Tracking expenses helps you understand where your money goes, reduces unnecessary spending, and builds financial discipline.
theory.Methods for Tracking Expenses: You can track expenses using notebooks, spreadsheets, or digital apps that automate categorization.
theory.Using Apps vs. Manual Tracking: Apps like Money View or Paytm simplify logging, while manual tracking offers more personal control and awareness.
theory.Gaining Insights from Expense Logs: Reviewing your expense log regularly highlights patterns, allowing you to plan budgets and cut avoidable costs.

activity: Start a daily expense log using a notebook, spreadsheet, or app.
Record every rupee you spend throughout the day.
Categorize expenses (e.g., food, travel, shopping, bills).
At the end of the day, review your list for insights.
Reflect: Did you spend on more wants or needs today?
